England has so-called “buffer zones” that make it illegal to engage in politically incorrect thoughts. This is why a British veteran has been convicted of thought crimes for praying in front of an abortion clinic.

Warning: This may invoke rage.

UNREAL

An army veteran has just been convicted in Britain for the crime of praying for his unborn child silently in his mind while in public near an abortion clinic.

Literal thought crime.

SHARE - This is Soviet style tyranny
title: British Veteran Convicted Of Thought Crimes For Praying In Front Of Abortion Clinic Over His Deceased Son

Mark Cuban is now claiming he would help Trump in his administration if asked because he is “America First.” However, in the same breath, he claimed that being America First is the “wrong way to put it” but that he is “country over party.”

It’s unclear why the media constantly asks Cuban what he thinks about the election, as no one cares, but he also believes Kamala is the better choice and it’s also unclear why he’s still talking. Nonetheless, he appeared on CNBC to discuss why he is America first while also explaining why he's not.
title: Wait, what? Kamala Harris supporting Mark Cuban now says he's "America First," will work with Trump

There was a point in the election cycle when we were told this was a "vibes" election, that it was all about "joy." All of that is true. The difference is that Donald Trump has culturally appropriated all of Kamala Harris's vibes and joy. She's boo-boo faced and stuck hanging out with Liz Cheney. Trump is almost having TOO much fun, and the Left and the media (but I repeat myself) f*cking hate it. See: McDonald's, Overreaction To.
title: Popular podcasters give Trump a copy of "Kamala's Greatest Achievements," his reaction is priceless
